name: Willoughby Design
tagline: Endearing brand experiences that delight & inspire
description:
Brands, like people, pass through life phases and face highs and lows along the way. From new endeavors with hopes and dreams to established classics that still have much to share, Willoughby helps brands grow up, succeed and stay in their prime.
Our Willo-bees are a curious, hard-working creative team with hives in Kansas City and San Francisco. Comprised of talented and tenured brand strategists, designers, writers and programmers – we’re Millennials, GenXers and Boomers all coming from very different experiences and viewpoints that influence our work. Our firm is led by a new generation of homegrown owner/principals who have been working together for 15+ years at Willoughby. Founded by Ann Willoughby, we are the longest, continuously running, woman-owned (WBE) brand design firm in the US.
